knimeNode.name: 3D WHIM
knimeNode.shortDescription: Holistic descriptors described by Todeschini et al. The descriptors are based on a number of atom weightings. There are 5 different possible weightings implemented.

fullDescription.intro: Creates new columns holding the calculated WHIM molecular properties computed for each fully configured 3D structure. The computations are based on the CDK toolkit. For unconnected molecules, only the largest fragment is used by the descriptor.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular structure.
Possible weighting schemes used for the properties calculations.

ports.inPort: Table containing molecular structure based on which the logP shall be computed.
ports.outPort: As input but with additional columns (one for each weighting scheme property).
